Diary of Lydia:
Twenty-fourth day of Shilen.

Fast deliver my invitation to Nidrah, and it took far too easy!
I had been prepared in such a hurry when he arrives! I had to make a thousand mistakes, but he did not say anything! He was too nice? Or maybe he just does not care!
He told me that he was here on business; and this case is nothing to do with our family.
Turn the page.
